thread.title: Kim Dewhurst
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Kim Dewhurst

author: Kim Dewhurst
title: Kim Dewhurst
text: I love getting LTB. As I told Andrew Schwartz in my email, it's like having a Christmas every month. I'm not such a great fisherman but it's nice to try out the different products I would be catching fish with if I knew what I was doing. Btw, Andrew deserves a raise, he contacted me quickly and didn't stop until he had the answer to my concern.
